recipesJson.name: Tropical Juice
recipesJson.author: daffynash
recipesJson.description:
Shake and Vape Juice, with tropical and exotic fruits.

Watermelon, Melon, Mango and Pineapple mixed and Cold.

Adjust Polar Blast(or Koolada or whatever cooling additive of your choice to taste) and Enjoy.

reviews.text: This is probably my favorite of all the honeydew-containing recipes that I've tried (or made).  Comes across as a cool, refreshing melon mix rather than honeydew with slight accents from other flavors.  This is definitely accompanying me on my cruise next month.
